name: ERC20 Atomic allowance
description: Contains the safe allowance update functions: increaseAllowance and decreaseAllowance.

eventDecorators.name: Token spending approval
eventDecorators.description: Indicates that approval to spend ERC20 token has occurred.

parameterDecorators.name: Approver address
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the owner who approved spending of their ERC20 token.

parameterDecorators.name: Spender address
parameterDecorators.description: Address for which the owner has approved to spend their ERC20 token.

parameterDecorators.name: Approved token amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of ERC20 token that was approved for spending.

functionDecorators.name: Increase allowed spending amount
functionDecorators.description: Increases the amount of funds that can be spent by another address.

parameterDecorators.name: Spender address
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the spender for whom the allowed spending amount will be increased.

parameterDecorators.name: Amount to add
parameterDecorators.description: The amount which will be added to the current allowed amount to spend.

returnDecorators.name: Operation succeeded
returnDecorators.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

functionDecorators.name: Decrease allowed spending amount
functionDecorators.description: Decrease the approved spending amount for the specified spender address. Transaction sender is implicitly the owner which decreases the approved allowance for the spender.

parameterDecorators.name: Spender address
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the spender for whom the allowed spending amount will be decreased.

parameterDecorators.name: Amount to subtract
parameterDecorators.description: The amount which will be subtracted from the current allowed amount to spend.

returnDecorators.name: Operation succeeded
returnDecorators.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.
